pkgmetadata.longdescription: Robust PCA by Projection Pursuit // Provides functions for robust PCA by projection pursuit. The methods are described in Croux et al. (2006) doi:10.2139/ssrn.968376, Croux et al. (2013) doi:10.1080/00401706.2012.727746, Todorov and Filzmoser (2013) doi:10.1007/978-3-642-33042-1_31.
